pages.text: $(item)Ores$() generate at different heights with different probability. $(br2)Some are even less likely to generate in caves (Air exposured).

pages.title: Best Ore Layers
pages.text: $(thing)The Overworld$() $(li)$(item)Coal Ore$(): Layer 95 & 136 $(li)$(item)Copper Ore$(): Layer 48 $(li)$(item)Lapis Ore$(): Layer -1 $(li)$(item)Iron Ore$(): Layer 15 & 232 $(li)$(item)Gold Ore$(): Layer -16 $(li)$(item)Redstone Ore$(): Layer -59 $(li)$(item)Diamond Ore$(): Layer -59 $(li)$(item)Emerald Ore$(): Layer 236 $(br2)$(thing)The Nether$() $(li)$(item)Nether Quartz$(): Layer 10-114 $(li)$(item)Gold Ore$(): Layer 96-116 $(li)$(item)Ancient Debris$(): 13-17
$(br2)The greatest variation in ores is around layer 0
